Description of efforts to assess, monitor, and reduce exposure of workforce to human health hazards
Context:
“Dell Technologies is committed to protecting the health, safety and welfare of our team members. We maintain occupational health and safety management systems in accordance with recognized standards (such as ISO 45001) at key facilities. These systems include mechanisms for hazard identification, risk assessment, incident investigation, and continuous improvement.”
 “Employees receive safety training tailored to the risks associated with their job roles. Facilities are expected to engage workers in health and safety committees or programs that promote awareness and drive local improvements.”

Metric: Total amount of monetary losses as a result of legal proceedings associated with employee health and safety violations

Topic: Recruiting & Managing a Global & Skilled Workforce

Processor energy efficiency at a system-level for (3) laptops
Description of the management of risks associated with the use of critical materials
Context:
“Dell Technologies supports responsible sourcing of minerals used in our products and is committed to ethical practices and supply chain transparency. We align our efforts with the OECD Due Diligence Guidance and require suppliers to source tin, tungsten, tantalum and gold (3TG) from smelters validated by the Responsible Minerals Assurance Process (RMAP).”

“We continue to engage with suppliers through the Responsible Minerals Initiative (RMI), conduct due diligence across our supply chain, and work to mitigate sourcing risks associated with conflict-affected and high-risk areas.”
“We’re increasing the use of recycled and renewable materials, such as aluminum, plastics, and rare earth magnets recovered through our closed-loop recycling systems. These materials reduce our reliance on virgin materials, which can carry geopolitical, environmental and ethical sourcing risks.”

“Our product teams collaborate with suppliers to identify sustainable alternatives and ensure compliance with our restricted materials list and international substance regulations.”
“Our Social and Environmental Responsibility (SER) program includes annual supplier audits, focused on labor rights, health and safety, environmental performance and materials management. We assess suppliers' conformance to Dell’s Code of Conduct and international standards.”

Metric: Total amount of monetary losses as a result of legal proceedings associated with anti-competitive behaviour regulations
Total production
Unit: Note to TC-SC-000.A – The entity shall disclose total production from its own manufacturing facilities and those with which it contracts for manufacturing services. For semiconductor equipment manufacturers the total production shall be reported on a per unit basis. For semiconductor device manufacturers the total production shall be reported consistent with International SEMATECH Manufacturing Initiative’s Semiconductor Key Environment Performance Indicators Guidance, Technology Transfer #09125069A-ENG.

Metric: Percentage of production from owned facilities
